name: Flaming Engines
overview: A top down racer. You can play the game in two modes, "arcade" and "strategy" mode. I played through both modes to check the differences. In arcade mode there is no shop between levels and you must qualify by don't get last in a lap. In this longplay I play the game in strategy mode just to show the shop. The ending is the same in both modes. Just a game over screen.
